channel.title: Whaddya Know Joe?
channel.description: Productivity stories from the trenches. What works and what I'll never do again. Hosted by Joe Buhlig.
channel.itunes:summary: Joe Buhlig walks you through real life story and then breaks down the productivity tools and techniques used. It's a great way to learn how to implement the tips and tricks that you see across the web. Productivity stories from the trenches. What works and what to never try.
channel.itunes:author: Joe Buhlig
channel.itunes:subtitle: Productivity stories from the trenches. What works and what I'll never do again. Hosted by Joe Buhlig.

item.title: 43: Big Project Decisions
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: I have a lot going on with a number of new projects taking off. But with new doors opening, a few doors need to be closed.
item.content:encoded:
I have a lot going on with a number of new projects taking off. But with new doors opening, a few doors need to be closed.

Working With Ideas

Bookworm – Podcast Book Club

@bookwormfm

Mike Schmitz

Working With OmniFocus

Essentialism by Greg McKeown

item.title: 42: Deciding On A Medium
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: If you create content in any form and have dabbled in multiple mediums, you’re left with a decision about which method of consumption is best for the topic you want to present.

item.title: 41: Fountain Pens
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: I’m pushing pen addict status. I don’t think I’m there yet, but I do have three fountain pens that I thoroughly enjoy using.

item.title: 39: Morning and Evening Rituals
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: What you do for your morning and evening rituals doesn’t have to match what others do. The top 10 things that highly successful people do in the morning may derail your day entirely.

item.title: 38: Using Multiple Desks In One Office
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Since starting to exclusively write with pen and paper, I’ve added a dedicated writing desk to my office. This week I explore the pros and cons of using multiple desks in my office.
item.content:encoded:
Since starting to exclusively write with pen and paper, I’ve added a dedicated writing desk to my office. This week I explore the pros and cons of using multiple desks in my office.

Writing Articles By Hand

The Science and Experience of Analog Writing

Leuchtturm Master Notebook A4 Hardcover Dotted Black

Rhodia Dotpads

Pilot G-2

Pilot Metropolitan - Notetaking fountain pen

Lamy Safari - Long-form writing fountain pen

Monteverde Invincia - Specialty writing fountain pen

Herman Miller Aeron

Palm Rest

Duncan Phyfe - Wikipedia

@WhaddyaKnowJoe

@JoeBuhlig

item.title: 35: Why I'm Into Productivity
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: I’ve been actively exploring why I am big into productivity for the past two months. In part, that led me to seeing a counselor and discovering a missing piece to my mental puzzle, even though it’s likely obvious to most.

item.title: 30: Decision Analysis Paralysis
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: When you have a large amount of data available, it’s easy to be paralyzed in making a decision about how to analyze it. The same is true when you have a lot of tasks and little clarity.

item.title: 29: Get Started and Iterate
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: In this episode, I go through the ideas behind agile development and applying them to get a minimum viable product out the door. This is exactly how OmniGroup has now gotten to the point of bringing themes back to OmniFocus. Oh, and I completely missed daylight savings.
item.content:encoded:
In this episode, I go through the ideas behind agile development and applying them to get a minimum viable product out the door. This is exactly how OmniGroup has now gotten to the point of bringing themes back to OmniFocus. Oh, and I completely missed daylight savings.

item.title: 10: Why I Don't Use Ads
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: I’ve avoided ads in my creative work from the beginning. But there’s a lot of pressure to use them as a way to make an income. In this episode, I explain why I don’t plan to change.
item.content:encoded:
I’ve avoided ads in my creative work from the beginning. But there’s a lot of pressure to use them as a way to make an income. In this episode, I explain why I don’t plan to change.

The DECK - an exception to the tracking ads out there.

item.description: I can’t believe I’ve started journaling every day. I’ve always equated journaling with writing in a diary, which is not for me. But the effects of not journaling caught me off-guard.

item.title: 3: Keeping Up with Pain Pills
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Ugh. Dealing with water coming into the family room. And of course, I hurt myself and had to have surgery. And surgery leads to pain pills.

item.title: 1: New Job New Contexts
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: If you go through a job change, you’ll need to change your GTD contexts. I walk you through my recent job transition and what I did to determine my new contexts.
item.content:encoded:
If you go through a job change, you’ll need to change your GTD contexts. I walk you through my recent job transition and what I did to determine my new contexts.

Getting Things Done: Introduction

GTD Contexts: Proactive vs. Reactive

Making Time for Contexts

Using Omnifocus for Someday/Maybe Lists

MacBook Pro vs MacBook Air
